price: Do the people of the towns feel secure that Our punishment will not befall them by night while they are asleep?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتٗا وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
